Profile picture: Simple digital drawing of a cursive capital letter D, stylized as the head of an elephant with a big ear, coloured light blue on a red background.

Header: Photo of the evening sky from a train station platform across a small number of tracks. The far horizon is glowing with a band of fiery red sky.
